title: Love Island's Jess Shears and Dom Lever share first official family snap with newborn baby
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island 's Jess Shears and Dom Lever welcomed their new arrival last month.

And the married couple, who got together on series three of the ITV2 dating show, have been teasing fans with sweet snaps of their adorable bundle of joy.

The name and gender of the tot, who was overdue, has yet to be revealed, but Friday marked a special occasion as Dom posted the first official photo of the three of them as a family to Instagram .

With the cute caption 'Familia' followed by a heart emoji, Dom, 28, proudly showed off his new family set-up.

The couple looked totally in love as they cosied together with beaming smiles to gaze at their adorable little one for the family snap.

️Jess showed off her post-baby body in a simple white T-shirt and jeans, while Dom also kept things casual in a similar matching outfit.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Jess announced the birth on October 5, sharing an adorable picture of the tiny baby lying on its front.

She captioned it: "Baby Lever"

Since then, the couple have continued to share a couple of similar images, where the baby's face isn't fully visible.

Dom and Jess have chosen to keep the details of their baby under wraps and stayed relatively quiet, only occasionally treating fans to cute photos.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

The smitten couple, who met on Love Island in 2017, tied the knot last year on Valentine's Day, hosting their romantic ceremony on the Greek Island of Mykonos.

The new mum has already been forced to hit out at vile baby trolls after she become a mother for the first time.

She wrote on Instagram: "Can people stop assuming they know anything about the birth of our child."

(Image: Instagram)

Jess continued: "Just because we chose to share an image yesterday does not mean that's when they were born.

"Dom, baby and I are happy, healthy and recovering at our own rate."

Love Island's Jess has also wasted no time getting back to the gym as she recently flaunted her amazing post-baby body on Instagram.
description: The Love Island power couple have shared a glimpse of their family life as they posted the first official photo with their new bundle of joy.
